Pre-Game Insights: Ecuador lost their opening match of the 2024 Copa America 2-1 to Venezuela, while Jamaica lost 1-0 to Mexico.
Ecuador have lost their last nine consecutive Copa America encounters.
Jamaica have not collected a single point or scored a goal in their seven all-time Copa America appearances.
Team News: Ecuador will be without their team captain, Enner Valencia, due to a red card.
Jeremy Sarmiento, who plays for Ipswich Town, scored for Ecuador in their opener and is on a yellow card.
Jamaica's captain Andre Blake is injured, with Jahmali Waite starting in goal.
